users.title: A.M.
users.description: The experience was great from ordering to shipping and now having my beautiful pothos! Thank you guys so much for the instructions to care for my new baby!
users.name: Pothos 'Neon'
users.detail_description: An electrifying color variation on the standard Pothos. ‘Neon’ has all of the tough, reliable features houseplant lovers have come to expect from Pothos, but with glowing, neon-green foliage. Place where the vines can fall freely or trail along a shelf for the best effect. Looks great grown in containers and hanging baskets. A terrific plant for tall plant stands where the trailing foliage will create a cascade of foliage over time.

users.title: A.T.
users.description: Very nice and healthy!!! Only downfall is that it's cold and I'm scared if I order more, thay won't survive in the mail. Totally not you're fault.
users.name: Peperomia 'Rosso'
users.detail_description: The Rosso has very distinctive pointed leaves with an attractive flowering variety with striking red undersides and deeply grooved glossy green leaves. Native to tropical Brazil, this plant will require similar care to most peperomias and succulents.

users.title: S.N.
users.description: Super impressed with the crazy fast shipping and very healthy, happy plant. Wish I had found you sooner!
users.name: Dracaena 'Tornado'
users.detail_description: This variety of Dracaena has Dark green leaves which grow in a spiral formation from its thin stem. The foliage has a bright greenish-yellow variegation on the edges of each leaf.

users.title: M.E.
users.description: It arrived in amazing condition, and is huge! I love it
users.name: Succulent Kalanchoe 'Panda Plant'
users.detail_description: The Panda Plant is a succulent native to Madagascar. This unique succulent has a velvety, green succulent with brown spots on the tips of the leaves.

users.title: K.M.
users.description: It came a bit rough. Box was messed up, but the plant looked good. After sitting it out, it's looking good. Highly recommend it.
users.name: Ficus Elastica 'Burgundy'
users.common_name: Rubber Plant, Rubber Tree, Rubber Fig
users.detail_description: Native to India and Southeast Asia, the Ficus elastica 'Burgundy' is perfect for those looking for a small indoor tree with thick, leathery, glossy, dark green leaves and pink to purplish stipules. In the wild, it grows up to around 200ft tall, and its roots are used in India to form living bridges. It won't do well in low light spaces, so place in bright indirect light. Water to keep soil moist at all times. Ficus elastica is a source of latex that is toxic to the skin, and poisonous if taken internally, so pet-owners and those allergic to latex should be cautious.

users.title: S.L.
users.description: Arrived in excellent condition!  Couldn't be happier..
users.name: Arabica Coffee
users.detail_description: The easy-to-care-for Arabian Coffee Plant has become popular indoor house plant that can produce white flowers and colorful cherries if grown large enough. The seeds inside the cherries are actually coffee beans, and make up around 60% of the world's coffee production. Originally found and documented in Yemen around the 12th century, Coffea arabica has a truly global distribution today. As a house plant, it requires minimum maintenance and can be put outside when the weather warms up.

users.title: J.R.
users.description: Plant was smaller than expected, with wilted and slimy leaves. Hopefully it will recover, but for the price, I'm disappointed.
users.name: Tradescantia 'Nanouk'
users.detail_description: Tradescantia albiflora ‘Nanouk’ is a low-growing trailing perennial known for its striking purple-green variegation and violet leaf undersides.

users.title: J.R.
users.description: The plant arrived in poor condition, not at all as advertised. All the leaves were browning and many leaves and stems were mushy. A week later and the plant appears to be all but dead.
users.name: Tradescantia Zebrina 'Wandering Dude'
users.common_name: Inch Plant, Zebra Plant, Silver Inch Plant
users.detail_description: This creeping plant makes a good groundcover 6-12” high. It has succulent stems with ovate to lanceolate leaves clasping the stem. The upper leaf surface is green to purple with two wide, silvery-white stripes, while the lower leaf surface is a uniform deep magenta. If you look closely you can see the fine hairs along the leaf margins and may note that the surfaces seem to sparkle in bright light. Color intensity is greatest in full sun in our area but in more southern locations too much sun will cause the colors to wash out.

users.title: K.H.
users.description: This is my second order.  I have been so impressed with their selections in the collections, careful packing and quick shipping.  No disease, bugs, or other scariness.
users.name: Assorted Succulent Variety
users.detail_description: This variety pack comes with an assortment of succulents in 4' pots. Discover the magic of succulents, ready to elevate your creativity in centerpieces, designs, bouquets, or the tranquil garden. Prepare to be enchanted by an extraordinary blend of colors, heights, and textures that promise to dazzle your senses. Each order arrives meticulously encased in protective packaging, making them the perfect gift for any nature enthusiast. Embrace the abundant variety of plant species, all thriving in their 4-inch round pots, ready to bring natural charm to your space. These plants will need water and some soil brushed from their leaves after transit. Please note that depending on season, availability, readiness, some species may differ from what is in the photos.

users.title: J.T.
users.description: Arrived in perfect condition like always! I love their plants and care of shipping. Thank you!
users.name: Maranta Variegated 'Beauty Kim'
users.common_name: Prayer plant, Variegated Maranta Leucornea, Beauty Kim
users.detail_description: Maranta leuconeura 'Beauty Kim' has beautiful foliage in medium green with a row of chocolate spots on each side that develop random variegation in splotches of white to creamy yellow!

users.title: L.S.
users.description: The plant arrived in perfect condition.  So healthy and well packed.  I'm very pleased!
users.name: Pothos 'N'joy'
users.detail_description: This Air purifying plant is arguably one of the easiest plants to grow indoors. The pothos grows in a vine like fashion making it a great plant to have in a hanging display to fill up any empty space on a shelf or desktop. This particular variety has shorter, more rounded leaves than a typical pothos, and has a tanish white pattern on the edges of its leaves.

users.title: T.O.
users.description: I received the Hoya 'Rope Plant' Variegated in a 4 pot. Got it in good, healthy condition and it was securely packed. I'll let it climatize for a while before replanting it in a larger pot. I can not wait to see how it grows. Thumbs up to this seller 👍👍
users.name: Hoya 'Rope Plant' Variegated
users.common_name: Hindu Rope, Porcelain Flower, Wax Plant, Honey Plant, Krinkle Curl
users.detail_description: Unique Hindu rope plants, Hoya carnosa compacta, are draping succulent vines that produce clusters of star-shaped waxy flowers. The thick, twisted, curly, cupped leaves of a Hindu rope plant are why it’s often called Krinkle Kurl. Hindu rope plants can be found in solid green or with variegated leaves. This type of hoya plant is very easy to care for as long as you have plenty of light and are careful with your water.

users.title: C.W.
users.description: The plant is really full and Beautiful 😍!
users.name: Dieffenbachia Camille
users.detail_description: The Dieffenbachia Camille also known as the Dumb Cane has large leaves that are a creamy yellowish-white with dark green around the border and thrives in a large range of environments.

users.title: T.O.
users.description: I received the Staghorn Fern in a 4 pot. Got it in good, healthy condition and it was securely packed. I'll let it climatize for a while before replanting it in a larger pot. I cannot wait to see how it grows. Thumbs up to this seller 👍👍
users.name: Staghorn Fern
users.detail_description: Native to Java and southeastern Australia, the Birds Nest 'Staghorn' fern has a fuzzy texture to the leaves that can get very large if taken care of. The name bifurcatum means forked, referring to the leaves that split and resemble stag or elk horns. It can grow up to 31-35 in tall and wide, and care is easy as long as they're provided with low to medium light and moderate moisture like most ferns.

users.title: D.E.
users.description: I love my house plant. I repotted it and have it in my bedroom. I gave a big window so it get light. Do so good so far.
users.name: Winter Plant Shipping Protection
users.detail_description: Our winter plant shipping protection is engineered to ship plants during the cold winter months. We recommend adding this winter plant shipping protection when ordering plants during the winter months (November - April) if you experience temps. below 50°F.
users.include_title: Winter Plant Shipping Protection Includes (As Needed):
include: Cold Weather Protection Guarantee - If your order arrives with cold damage when the shipping protection is added to your order, we will either send you a new replacement or issue a full refund.

users.title: C.U.
users.description: Wow I am really impressed of how happy  my maiden hair fern looks on arrival. It was well boxed and adequately protected from being banged around in the mail. As you can see, she looks great right out of the box! 😍
users.name: Maidenhair Fern
users.common_name: Black Maidenhair Fern, Maidenhair Fern, Southern Maidenhair Fern, Venus Hair Fern
users.detail_description: 'Maidenhair Fern' actually refers to the genus Adiantum, which has over 250 species. Our Maidenhair fern, sometimes called the 'Black' Maidenhair Fern, is native to the southern half of the United States and South America, but has a worldwide distribution today. It is a popular choice for its many soft, delicate leaves and easy care. The Black Maidenhair fern grows up to 15 in in height, and prefers care similar to other ferns, preferring indirect sunlight or partial shade and moderate moisture.

users.title: A.B.
users.description: The plant arrived in good condition
users.name: Philodendron Mini Monstera Minima
users.common_name: Mini Monstera, Monstera Minima, Philodendron Piccolo, Cheese Plant Lite, Holes Plant
users.detail_description: Raphidophora Tetrasperma is a fast-growing vining plant like the famous Monstera form. This is one of the fastest-growing varieties of aroid which is desired for its unique fenestrated leaves. Sometimes it is also called “Dwarf Monstera” or “Monstera Ginny” as it resembles the Monstera deliciosa. It originates from Southern Thailand and from Malaysia and belongs to the Araceae family of plants.

users.title: B.R.
users.description: This is the lost beautiful chain of harts I’ve received!! Healthy plant with beautiful variegation!! 3in pot but the plant looks very solid!! It’s definitely flourishing!!.
users.name: String of Hearts Variegated
users.detail_description: The string of hearts is a trailing succulent native to South Africa. This plant has long, loose tendrils with circular, spade shaped leaves which gives it the appearance of small hearts growing along its vines. The plants foliage has a blotched pattern which can range from pink to light green, giving it a very unique camo-like look.

users.title: R.C.
users.description: I love my new plants! They make the room so much brighter!
users.name: Pothos 'Golden'
users.detail_description: This Air purifying plant is arguably one of the easiest plants to grow indoors. The pothos grows in a vine like fashion making it a great plant to have in a hanging display to fill up any empty space on a shelf or desktop. Place where the vines can fall freely or trail along a shelf for the best effect. Looks great grown in containers and hanging baskets. A terrific plant for tall plant stands where the trailing foliage will create a cascade of foliage over time.

users.title: M.P.
users.description: The poor plant showed up struggling for dear life. I have tried to save it but I think it was too far gone :(

users.name: Succulent Echeveria 'Perle Von Nurnberg'
users.detail_description: Echeveria 'Perle Von Nurnberg' is a purple-green wide growing rosette succulent that will most certainly provide an aesthetic look to your overall collection. It comes as no surprise that this Echeveria variant looks so cool and is easy to maintain since it is of course an Echeveria succulent.

users.title: A.R.
users.description: This poor baby isn’t doing so well. I’m not sure what is wrong, as I have been doing what I read to do. The baby came packaged real well but stared losing leaves the next day.
users.repiled: We're very sorry about this. We would be more than happy to help! We offer a 30 day guarantee on all of our plants. Could you please contact us here: https://houseplantshop.com/pages/contact
users.name: Hypoestes 'Polka Dot'
users.detail_description: Native to South Africa, Madagascar, and south east Asia, the polka dot plant is a lively and beautiful little plant with brightly spotted leaves that stand out especially well against other plants. Put them in a mass of ferns or ivies, and their colors will stand out in bright contrast. In colder climates it is an annual plant, expected to live for about one year and die off after its sprout. In tropical climates, it is a perennial that lives a long time.

users.title: C.M.
users.description: I have had great experiences with house plant shop before, but this was pretty upsetting. I got this plant in and half the plant was broken out of the pot and it was in really bad shape.
users.name: Dracaena Deremensis 'Lemon Surprise'
users.detail_description: Dracaena are composed of a large group of popular foliage plants. Most grow strongly upright with striking broad leaves striped with white and lime green on the edges and a darker shade of green in the middle of the leaves. Dracaenas grow well at average room temperatures but don't like cold drafts. Give plants medium to bright light to maintain the best leaf color. Allow the soil to dry to the touch between waterings.

users.title: S.S.
users.description: Sadly, I was not impressed.  I have received beautiful, healthy plants from House Plant Shop in the past, but this one arrived with all the dirt spilled out of its pot, crushed leaves, and nearly dead.  I repotted it of course and did my best to nurse it back to health, but it was too late.  Dead plant :(
users.repiled: We're very sorry about this. We would be more than happy to make this right. We offer a 30 day guarantee on all of our plants. Could you please contact us here: https://houseplantshop.com/pages/contact
users.name: Hypoestes 'Polka Dot'
users.detail_description: Native to South Africa, Madagascar, and south east Asia, the polka dot plant is a lively and beautiful little plant with brightly spotted leaves that stand out especially well against other plants. Put them in a mass of ferns or ivies, and their colors will stand out in bright contrast. In colder climates it is an annual plant, expected to live for about one year and die off after its sprout. users.title: S.S.
users.description: For the price, I expected it to be fully braided and for it to be larger.
users.name: Snake Plant 'Braided'
users.detail_description: This evergreen perennial native to tropical West Africa and Nigeria, is a great addition to any office or household as a natural air purifier. Snake plants have strong and sturdy, sword shaped leaves which are drought tolerant and retains the plants water. This plant can be easily propagated by leaf cuttings so you can multiply your family of snake plants or give them away as a gift.

users.title: C.C.
users.description: My aloe Vera plant arrived earlier than expected, however the box it shipped in was too small and the tips of the leaves were bent. I’m not happy about this.
users.name: Aloe Vera
users.common_name: Chinese Aloe, First Aid Plant, Burn Aloe, True Aloe.
users.detail_description: The Aloe Vera is a stemless succulent with thick and fleshy leaves that are lined with small teeth making it a great ornamental, low maintenance indoor plant which blooms a yellow tubular flower in the summertime. Native to the Arabian Peninsula, this plant is widely used around the world as its leaves are considered to be antimicrobial and has been used to treat burns as a topical medication.
users.covid: *due to COVID inventory issues on the raw materials, planters are not shipped with the saucer.

users.title: G.L.
users.description: There must’ve been some issue with shipping, the plant arrived much later than the other item I ordered it with. The plant had also come out of the 6” pot and was loose in the packaging when I opened the box. She is very droopy and there is some slight browning to her leaves but hopefully after repotting her and getting some water it will be alright. She is still a gorgeous plant, I love all the colors, and can’t wait to watch her grow.

users.title: J.R.
users.description: Plant was smaller than expected, with wilted and slimy leaves. Hopefully it will recover, but for the price, I'm disappointed.

users.title: J.H.
users.description: This plant is very cute. I had wanted it ever since I first saw it but it did not like sitting on my desk with an east facing window. I put it with the grow light to see what it will do now

users.title: T.M.
users.description: Really hoping my plant does ok. Came in in fairly decent condition but not great. It was really fragile and not super study. I repotted it today & put a little stake to hold it up better straight. Thinking it just needs to adjust now. Hoping it gets really curly!  Any tips??

users.title: L.S.
users.description: Bought one for sister earlier and it was beautiful!  Had high hopes for similar, but was a bit disappointed.  The other plant ordered was the least attractive with more damage prior to shipping as well as from nearly 7 days in the box.  I will trim dead and damaged stems and leaves and am confident this plant will be beautiful in time.  Just not the instant gratification one hopes for as they anticipate getting a new plant.  Sigh.

users.title: L.S.
users.description: Disappointed.  Very scraggly plant with leaves obviously damaged  prior to shipping in addition to losses due to 7 days in box.  Very pricy for the quality of this one.  Bought a tricolor queen for sister earlier and it was so beautiful that I hoped for similar.  Contacted company but they referred it to route provider, but we have never had USPS honor any damage claim and this box was in perfect shape and tracked 'on schedule' so not going there.  A partial refund by the company would have been a welcome gesture as both plants in this order will likely grow into beautiful plants in time so full replacement would be too much.  Just no instant gratification.  Sigh. Strange if this gets posted since I tried a numberof times to post the review with my genuine rating of 3 stars ⭐ ⭐ ⭐.

users.title: R.M.
users.description: It’s soooo tiny (cute)!!!! I am new to plants and thought it would be a bit bigger but it seems like it’s healthy.

users.title: T.C.
users.description: It would be nice if online plant retailers would showcase both HOW their plants will be look when they are received along with how they WILL look.....eventually.........instead of building up the expectation of the gift-giver that their gift will be received looking as advertised. I like to give plants as gifts but prefer they come looking grown......but for me.....I'm pleased with the service. 😊

users.title: M.B.
users.description: I've never had pothos before, so I thought this would be an easy, cost effective way to get into it. I received 4 single leaf cuttings and 1 two leaf cutting, all of them had dark coloring on the stem part, but the leaves were pretty intact. At this moment, the two leaf cutting died and rotted, and the other 4 are alive. One of the 4 has two roots growing and the rest just have little leaf spikes developing. They all had the dark rot so I cut as much of it off as possible and thats when they started growing. They're in water to root. Overall, they look fine and seem to be healthy enough, but I'm a little confused with the dark color (rot i think) and sad about the dead cutting because it was the prettiest of the bunch.
users.repiled: We're very sorry about this. We would be more than happy to make this right. We offer a 30 day guarantee on all of our plants. Could you please contact us here: https://houseplantshop.com/pages/contact

users.title: S.G.
users.description: Even though there has been some glitches overall I’m satisfied with the plants and the service that I have received so far. For now I won’t buy plants from anywhere else.

users.title: E.R.
users.description: Plant came in good condition. I have no complaints. I have subscribed to the monthly box subscription. Very please, and looking forward to receiving my monthly box.

users.title: S.S.
users.description: 4inch moonshine snake plant. Looks as pictured. Appears healthy. Packaging was five stars.

users.title: C.K.
users.description: Needs some loving care but coming along nicely.

users.title: C.C.
users.description: The plant looks okay but it needed TLC upon arrival.  There were a number of broken stems that could have happened in shipping.  I hope it recovers and prospers.
